benjamin-flores.name: Benjamin Flores
benjamin-flores.bio: Ben has been building software products for 7 years, with 300K+ users and clients like the Ethereum Foundation. Passionate about preserving memories and helping families create lasting legacies through technology.

movila-team.name: Movila Team
movila-team.bio: The Movila team is dedicated to helping families preserve their most precious memories through beautiful, cinematic mini-films.
